info.author: Tetrad Implemented by DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The Estimator component takes as input a tab-delimited data set and a tetrad graph. Based on the input graph, this component will estimate parameters for a model that is selected (SEM or Bayes). If the input graph is not a directed acyclic graph, this component will try to convert it into one. The converted edges will appear yellow in the output graph.
Tetrad Website
info.outputs:
tetrad-graph - SEM estimated graph if SEM is selected in the options. Otherwise, if Bayes is selected, then it is the original graph.
text - Model statistics. Various information about the estimated model.
tab-delimited - Table with various information about the model. Only for SEM.
tab-delimited - Correlation Matrix
